Package slu.compiler

Class LexicalAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
slu.compiler.LexicalAnalyzer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILexicalAnalyzer
public class LexicalAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILexicalAnalyzer
LexicalAnalyzer is a customized scanner to be used in CSCI 3200 Programming Languages. To import this library use import slu.madrid.compiler.*; The file 'lexicon.txt' defines the tokens and the lexemes of the language. This file should be copied to the folder that contains the Java project
Version:
1.0 February, 2023
Author:
Jorge Martinez
